full_summary:
### Title
Tender Notice: Temporary Help Services Requirement for the Department of National Defense

### Reference and Solicitation Information
*Reference Number#: *cb-7643-76353625*
*Solicitation Number*: S4551436
*Contracting Entity:* Department of National Defense
*Contract Address:* 60 Moodie Drive
*City*: Ottawa
*Province: *ON *
*Postal Code*: K2H8G1
*Country*: Canada

### Tender Overview
The Department of National Defense (DND) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for Temporary Help Services. This requirement is open only to holders of Supply Arrangement (SA) EN578-172870 who have qualified under the streams and categories listed below:

* 5.1 Computer, Application Support – Senior

### Tender Eligibility
The following SA holders have been invited to submit a proposal:

1. 1019837 Ontario Inc.
2. 7792395 Canada Inc.
3. Advanced Chippewa Technologies Inc.
4. Altis Human Resources (Ottawa) Inc.
5. Barbara Personnel Inc.
6. Coradix technology Consulting Ltd.
7. IPSG Technology Inc.
8. Mekkra Corp.
9. Olav Consulting Corp.
10. OLAV CONSULTING CORP., MOSHWA ABORIGINAL INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY CORPORATION, IN JOINT VENTURE
11. Portage Personnel Inc.
12. S.I. SYSTEMS ULC
13. Solutions Moerae Inc.
14. TAG HR The Associates Group Inc.
15. TechWind Inc.

### Tender Description
The DND has a requirement for Temporary Help Services and has issued a RFP to suppliers generated from CPSS who are qualified under the above streams and categories. The level of security required is Secret.

### Tender Closing and Contact Information
*Closing Date*:	Tuesday, August 3, 2023 11:00 AM
*Contact Person*: CFSG(O-G) Temp Help
*Contact Information:* cfsgo-gtemporaryhelp-gsfcogdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca
*Contact Phone*: 613-971-795
*Tender Document*: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/notice/tender-notice-7643\_/method-1----rf-rfp\_(english-version.pdf)

**Note:** This tender announcement has expired. The above information is for historical or informational purposes. Do not use this
